attributes.action: Ban on all MPs pay rises for the foreseeable future
attributes.additional_details: Because they have neglected to carry out the duties bestowed upon them in a professional manner. We have been lied to and the system has been cheated and abused by the current and past members
attributes.background: Stop all pay rises for government officials including Prime minister, members of parliament and all other government officials

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting MPs' pay. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/
